definition: to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: The applied force and the riveting time are selected.
sentences.chinese: 铆接的作用力和铆接时间都是可以调节的。

sentences.english: The applied force and the riveting time are selected.
sentences.chinese: 铆接的作用力和铆接时间都是可以调节的。

sentences.english: The outer circle of the thermal fuse is riveted with a copper sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 热熔断器的外圆上铆接有铜套。

sentences.english: The active upper proboscis was riveted with the lower proboscis .
sentences.chinese: 活动鸟上喙用销子与下喙铆接。

sentences.english: He riveted those steel plates together.
sentences.chinese: 他把那些钢板铆接在一起。

sentences.english: The carbon fibers with high strength and modulus Lyocell fibers as the .
sentences.chinese: 研究了高模量碳纤维复合材料结构的电磁铆接工艺。

sentences.english: The all-hydraulic riveting machine is important mechanical equipment used in automobile industry now.
sentences.chinese: 全液压铆接机是目前汽车装配生产中使用的重要设备。

sentences.english: The working table is adjustable while the riveting unit remains fixed.
sentences.chinese: 工作台面高度可调节，而铆接单元保持固定。

sentences.english: Linking Riveting Process Parameters to the Fatigue Performance of Riveted Aircraft Structure.
sentences.chinese: 铆接过程参数与铆接飞机结构的疲劳性能的联系。

sentences.english: Linking Riveting Process Parameters to the Fatigue Performance of Riveted Aircraft Structure.
sentences.chinese: 铆接过程参数与铆接飞机结构的疲劳性能的联系。

sentences.english: The riveting force is generated hydraulically or pneumatically, depending on the model.
sentences.chinese: 根据型号的不同，铆接力输出分为液压和气压两种。

sentences.english: Both units are controlled by the same RND control box.
sentences.chinese: RND型的控制器可以同时控制两个铆接单元。

sentences.english: We have to find out how to do EMR successfully without causing damage in high modulus carbon fiber composites structure .
sentences.chinese: 研究了高模量碳纤维复合材料结构的电磁铆接工艺。

sentences.english: For fastening aircraft parts together, riveting is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 采用铆接法，把飞行器部件连接在一起。

sentences.english: They began producing what they called "copper-riveted waist overalls."
sentences.chinese: 他们开始制作他们所谓的“铜铆接齐腰工装裤”。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the stroke can be adjusted by the nonius or micrometer screw.
sentences.chinese: 另外，铆接行程也可通过游标或螺旋测微计来调节。

definition: to stamp/to press (sheet metal)/Taiwan pr. [chong1 ya1]
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
